Articles.Content:
hello so i just got a macbook pro i7

i can not pull up the Debug Console to use part clipping

iv tried a combo of keys but no go is option f2,12,d shift control option d and still not go. im full screen mode as well.
It's Alt+F12 for OSX, though I suspect you need to use the Fn key or you need to change a setting so the F keys are actually used as F keys and not something else

It's Alt+F12 for OSX, though I suspect you need to use the Fn key or you need to change a setting so the F keys are actually used as F keys and not something else

thanks Sal ya it turned out that i had to do just that make F keys work as such
